title: Brought to Tears

en: Finally, finally feedback is starting to get more universally positive. In fact, you received a touching e-mail today from an enthused tester who is excited about what you're doing. They explain they're a young college student, and hope that someday they'll be able to make something like this. The thought unexpectedly brings you to tears.

no_caption: Try not to think about it

en: Internally, you accept what the person says. But it's overwhelming, and weighs on your mind all day. You don't get as much done as you'd like.
You put it aside for now to focus on your work. There isn't room for the reflection it would take to process this right now.
